name: Apple iPad 32 GB 9.7 inch with Wi-Fi+4G
content:
I m a radiology resident I use it for reading ebooks and ct and MRI images..it fulfilled my requirements. So I strongly recommend for students.
Before purchasing I enquired about lot of tabs.I initially little bit worried about lack of antiglare screen but its not at all big deal.I was nt able differentiate it from iPad pro and air 2 which has antiglare screen.previously I used Samsung,Asus and HP tabs but apple is apple.
Which model to purchase in iPads
1)iPad 2017-for reading ebooks and all basic purposes will be fulfillment
Cons: doesn't support pencil and apple keyboard but its not a matter if ur nt a artist.
Only 26 GB will be available if u want more go fr iPad air 2 128 GB bcoz same price to that of iPad 2017 128 GB.(see in paytm)
2)iPad pro beautiful thin and supports pencil and keyboard.(u shud spend 2.5 x times the price of iPad 2017)
3)If u are medical student go for iPad 2017/it meets your requirements.
My colleagues has iPad air 2 &pro so I was able to tell about those models.
Thank you..... READ MORE

name: Apple iPad 32 GB 9.7 inch with Wi-Fi+4G
review title: Best value for money tablet in the market
content:
I'll just quickly break down what I have to say in pros & cons:
Pros:
*Super snappy A9 processor, handles everything you throw at it very well
* The screen is brightest I've ever seen on an iPad(including pros)
*The battery is a monster, you really have to work hard to kill it in a day
*Price! It's hard to beat this tablet at this price
*Typical apple high built quality
Cons:
*The display is non laminated and hence the colours are not as vibrant as on a laminated display plus it makes the screen a lot more reflective(You'll not even notice it if you haven't held a device with a laminated display)
*It's a bit thicker than the Air 2 that it replaces (probably because of the extra battery- so I don't mind)
*They have removed the physical mute switch which I liked so much

Conclusion: Hard to beat package at this price READ MORE

name: Apple iPad 32 GB 9.7 inch with Wi-Fi+4G
content:
I'm using the iPad 9.7 2017 since 1onth now and below is my review about it:

(1) Screen - Absolutely stunning.
(2) Battery - Easily lasts for a day with normal heavy use with full brightness.
(3) Storage - I got about 28 GB out of that 32 GB mark. It is more than sufficient as I'm using it only for business presentation purpose.
(4) OS - Very good operating system.(though I'm an Android lover)
(5) Build quality - Comeon guys, any doubt about Apple devices' build quality? Solid build quality.
(6) File transfer - It is a headache specially if you are used to Android. But it is manageable. Not so bad either.

What more do you need from tablet at such low price?

It is a damm reasonable Tablet. Just go for it. READ MORE

name: Apple iPad 32 GB 9.7 inch with Wi-Fi+4G
review title: Best replacement for laptops and mobiles
content:
This is my first tablet I bought, and it has been a great experience using it this far.

Tablets are typically being used as a replacement for the smaller mobile screens and the cumbersome laptops. I use my iPad precisely as a replacement for laptop.
Although one cannot gat all the functionalities of a laptop, it can be used for reading, viewing presentations, watching videos, taking notes, doing MOOCs and many more!

iPad has the best battery backup and user interface. Although its priced on the higher side, I consider it an objective investment for the satisfaction it gives while using it! READ MORE

name: Apple iPad 32 GB 9.7 inch with Wi-Fi+4G
content:
It has great speed and everything. Typing out and mailing a document is real easy - that was my primary purpose of buying the iPad, to use it as a lightweight alternative to a laptop, and that purpose has been served. Also works very well with wi-fi, as I had hoped for.

It takes a little while to figure out that a side swipe from the right edge can show me all the apps - at first, I was continuously pressing the home button to go back to the apps menu and feeling irritated about this. The app display management could still have been better, but that's okay - I can live with this.

The reason I can't give the tablet a fifth star is the pathetic sound. There are two speakers but both are at the bottom of the device, and that means, whenever I watch something in landscape mode, the sound comes from one end of the device! Not expected from Apple. Even my tiny Moto e2 phone does better than that - it produces stereo sound in landscape mode, which means Moto's internal sound mechanism is better than Apple. Anything I watch on the iPad will require earphones; whereas, I don't always need earphones to watch a trailer on the Moto e2.

Other than this, I am quite happy with the product. READ MORE

name: Apple iPad 32 GB 9.7 inch with Wi-Fi+4G
content: Yes, I am perfectly satisfied with my IPad 2017. I had bought the 32 GB variant with WiFi only for my regular media consumption and study purposes and I must say that it does that very well. I love it. Games are super smooth with the new Apple A9 bionic chip. Display is top notch and you really get that premium feeling while using the iPad. I know it's very reflective in day light but common who uses iPad outdoors for checking notification. Battery life is super awesome. After watching two movies and 9-10 YouTube videos, I noticed that the battery was at 75%. I wholeheartedly agree that finally Apple has got the right pricing for this device, no denying that. If you are gonna buy it then do remember that at this price range you can easily buy other tabs having android as their OS like Samsung tabs. But do remember that they are very old. Also do remember that it's predecessor I.e. IPad Pro is also worth it if you have proper budget for it. But that's another thing. READ MORE

name: Apple iPad 32 GB 9.7 inch with Wi-Fi+4G
content:
I ensured to buy from Flipkart Assured seller (IndiFlashMart) hence no problem in packaging or the product itself. Talking about the product-it is sturdy, not very light but not on the heavier side too. The screen quality, resolution is the best in this range, perhaps unmatched compared to other tablets of similar size in similar range. The screen is 100% fingerprint magnet but not a problem.. For those wondering about the NON LAMINATED display, yes one can spot that gap but is not at all a problem. Don't let this hinder you from buying this product.
I have been an android user and using iOS is easy, but it is worth mentioning that android gives way more freedom than iOS, but still, iOS-11 on iPad has its own beauty.. Absolutely love it.
Other Things
Speakers- are very good.
Cameras - grainy in low light.. otherwise is descent.
Gaming is descent, haven't had any lags.
The back is probably polycarbonate i guess, but not metal for sure.

One would not regret having purchased this.. Not at all.. READ MORE

The product is great. Infact, although the name seems a little suspicious, but even then seller is great. Good packing. But the one thing I really dislike is the ekart's delivery service. It's so pathetic, always crosses promised deadline, never ever arrives in time, courier boys are so arrogant and irresponsible, pos machine never works so always have to pay in cash. These little things make u a loser. Stop being a loser flipkart. Your own subsidiary ekart is going to sink u someday.
Now, about product, it's awesome. Checked serial no. on the site, it's original with one year warranty. Bought 128gb grey, wifi only model. Display is awesome, don't listen to few people critising about lack of lamination etc. It's good and u barely can notice the air gap in grey model. Performance is good. Speed and battery life is also good. I suggest u to buy 128 gb model because overtime u fill it up fast and then worry about deleting stuff. Also it's new 64bit chipset makes it future proof. So, better than Air2 in that way. The only thing you don't get is apple pencil support. But you can always buy a Bluetooth stylus and a keyboard. So, overall good buy. name: Apple iPad 32 GB 9.7 inch with Wi-Fi+4G
content:
First Apple product.
Price offered at Flipkart is very much value for money.
I have been using it since 24th October.
Biggest strong point is BATTERY, which lasts for whole day weather one use it for surfing,video streaming & playing games.
Touch is smooth like butter.
Build quality is superb as expected by Apple.
Premium quality material used in this.
Drag and drop function is fantastic which makes task fun.
Picture quality is good when you use camera in full light.
Storage is bit issue as I am using 32 GB version, but it is common in Apple devices when you go for small storage versions.
My advice for first time Tablet buyers,they must consider this Apple device.
iOS 11 like butter.
Last thank you Flipkart for giving me this fantastic deal. READ MORE

name: Apple iPad 32 GB 9.7 inch with Wi-Fi+4G
content: Apple is apple. Just brought this for apple logo. I want a apple product. Only purpose is to show off in front of my friends. I could buy iPhone 6 at almost same price but this one is better as it has a9 chipset with is damn fast than in comparison with a8 chipset in iPhone 6. And it has a full hd display and better than hd display of iPhone 6. It's best in it's class. No company has launched a tough competitor to iPad. In comparison with iPad. All other companies make garbage tablets. I think it's the only market in which apple destroys their competitors ruthlessly (saying about tablet market). Neither it is a 7 inch or 8 inch ugly Android tablets (I'm Android fanboy still I hate those tablets) nor it's a outdated Samsung tablet. It's APPLE. It's antutu scores r 140k. Cool right. But it doesn't have flash in main camera, in selfie camera, it uses screen flash. As no-one use camera for clicking photos.... mostly...so no problem for me even if they don't have camera... Just the thing I needed from this product is just Apple logo. And even iOS 11 update is released for iPad. I m wondering that why Google can't do things quick like Apple. Android O is still not available in India and even iOS 11 is released and been available for update in iPhones and iPad. First apple product and I'm loving it. ;) And also I brought it in just 21k. Big billion days offer. ;) READ MORE

name: Apple iPad 32 GB 9.7 inch with Wi-Fi+4G
content:
ekart service: excellent
buying experience at flipkart: Excellent, kudos to Flipkart for the great offers on the Big Billion days.
Product: it is an awesome product from Apple. Has the latest IOS 11, It is a delight for first time buyers of apple product. Possessors of Ipad Air may find it a downgrade.

Few words for future buyers:
online buying ain't easy these days, there is always the fear that seller may cheat, the product may not be genuine, the product could be refurbished or defective. Besides, the large number of positive and negative reviews for the product leaves prospective buyers even more confused. Therefore I would suggest the following:
1. Fix your budget first
2. decide upon the specs you want based on your need : youtube reviews are helpful in this.
4. see whether the product is from a good brand or not.
3. see whether the product is flipkart assured or not, if it is flipkart assured then just go for it without even thinking twice, flipkart assured is a guarantee of quality and genuiness of the product,swift delivery in robust packaging.The seller cannot take you for a ride if the product is fassured. name: Apple iPad 32 GB 9.7 inch with Wi-Fi+4G
content:
Wow!! Just amazing!!
I've been an Android guy since beginning and Linux fan. Didn't expect much, except great build quality which was the reason to purchase it. But I am pleasantly surprised!!
The heart of the tablet is A9 processor which is equivalent to Snapdragon 820 in benchmarks and more powerful in real life thanks to optimised iOS. It also has M9 co processor for augmented reality!
Battery life is mind blowing for someone coming from Android like me. It easily exceeds one day after heavy usage!
The OS experience is flawless and much better than Android.
Only cons are its camera and low sound. I didn't find any issue with the display, as other reviewers state.
Overall, it was a steal deal at 19,900!! READ MORE

name: Apple iPad 32 GB 9.7 inch with Wi-Fi+4G

Verdict: If there are no budget constraints then pls go for it. READ MORE
